A wrapper over the Sundials CVODE numerical integrator

A wrapper for the Sundials CVODE numerical integration library The wrapper is only for initial value problems. Each wrapper function has two versions: one that accepts a function with differential equation definitions one that accepts a stoichiometry matrix and a propensity function The wrapper provides support for event functions and user defined structs as parameter. Detailed Description

A wrapper for the Sundials CVODE numerical integration library The wrapper is only for initial value problems. Each wrapper function has two versions: one that accepts a function with differential equation definitions one that accepts a stoichiometry matrix and a propensity function The wrapper provides support for event functions and user defined structs as parameter.
